name: director
desc: You see a large slightly overweight person with slightly bloodshot eyes hunched over a desk who speaks with a loud voice.
long: Well hello there. You surprised me. I am working here late on my travel budget for a band trip. Then I have to figure out how to pay for it, how much to ask from the district, how much for fund raising, etc. And I am not good with financial math.
short: I am working late on my travel budget and funding plan. I am not good with financial math.
hint: I wish I had a calculator.
